power.title: Accelerating Strike
power.fluff: When you surge toward a foe, the momentum of your attack carries you through the rest of the combat

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift your speed. You can move through enemies' spaces during this movement, but cannot end this movement there.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC
You have combat advantage for this attack if you moved through at least one enemy's space during the shift

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage.
Your movement does not provoke reactive strikes from the target until the end of the encounter.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
You gain a +4 bonus to defense against reactive strikes from the target triggered by your movement.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to speed.
In addition, when you shift or move a distance that isn't based on your speed, you shift or move 1 additional square.

power.title: Allies to Enemies
power.fluff: Your attack rattles your foe with a vision of its allies betraying it, causing it to lash out at a companion before realizing its mistake

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target makes a melee basic attack as a free reaction against a creature of your choice.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against a creature of your choice, but deals only half damage on the attack.

power.title: Aspect of Bitter Ice
power.fluff: Your weapon is rimed with ice as you strike and, in the aftermath, you are imbued with a bitter cold that protects you and slows your enemies

section.name: Attack:
section.target: each enemy in the burst you can see
section.text: Constitution vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Constitution modifier cold damage, you push the target 1 square, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You transform into the aspect of the bitter ice until the end of the encounter.

While in this aspect, you gain resist 5 cold, and add the following effect entry whenever you augment any of your Battlemind at-will attack powers, in addition to any other effects for augmenting the power:

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you is slowed until the end of that turn.
In addition, when you do augment your Battlemind at-will attack powers, one target you hit with that power takes additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Aspect of Elevated Harmony
power.fluff: Your eyes glow as you achieve harmony of mind, body, and spirit, a state in which you are able to heal yourself, and understand where to strike your enemy best and how to lessen its blows

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.
You then transform into the aspect of elevated harmony until the end of the encounter.
While in this aspect, you add the following effect entry whenever you augment any of your Battlemind at-will attack powers, in addition to any other effects for augmenting the power:

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain temporary hit poionts equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.
In addition, when you do augment your Battlemind at-will attack powers, one target you hit with that power takes additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Corona of Floating Force
power.fluff: As you swing, the air around you ripples with psionic force that knocks back your enemy and levitates you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Constitution modifier force damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Floating Force stance.
While you remain in the stance, you ignore difficult terrain, and take no damage from hindering terrain or terrain hazards.

power.title: Living Fortress
power.fluff: As you lash out at your foe, a shroud of rock and scree rises from the ground to protect you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you and allies adjacent to you have cover. You can take the following action:

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: This effect ends, and until the end of your next turn, you have cover and resist 5 all.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Psionic Anchor
power.fluff: You bind your foe with an anchor of psionic energy so that you can draw it back to your side with only a thought

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is anchored to you (save ends).
While anchored, you can use a free interrupt at the end of the target's turn to teleport it to a space adjacent to you.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is anchored to you until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Steel Unity Strike
power.fluff: You become one with your weapon as you unleash a davastating attack against your foe, leaving yourself in a position to strike again if your enemies flee

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Steel Unity stance.
While you remain in the stance, you can use the Unity Strike attack at will.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy adjacent to you and marked by you triggers a reactive strike with movement

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage.

section.name: Special:
section.text: This counts as a reactive strike for abilities that enhance them.

power.title: Stolen Grace
power.fluff: Your foe's movement wracks it with psychic pain in the aftermath of your attack, even as your own mobility is heightened.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target's mind recoils from speed (save ends).
While recoiling, the target takes 5 psychic damage whenever it moves more than half its speed in one movement, or it is pushed, pulled or slid more than half its movement in one forced movement.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Stolen Grace stance.

While you remain in the stance, you gain a +4 power bonus to AC and Reflex against reactive strikes, and against attacks triggered by your movement. You also gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls with reactive strikes.
